com.orientechnologies.orient.core.serialization

Class OMemoryInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • com.orientechnologies.orient.core.serialization.OMemoryInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class OMemoryInputStream
extends InputStream
    Class to parse and write buffers in very fast way.
    Author:
    Luca Garulli (l.garulli--(at)--orientdb.com)
